## lambert variable

Inline function. Computes Lambert term, i.e. `max(dot(n, l), 0)`<!-- -->. Both vectors must be pre-normalized.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lambert: (n: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"vec3">, ldir: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"vec3">) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").FnCall<"float">
```
